meanings.definition: To give or confer (something) as a gift or honor.
meanings.sent1: She bestrowed a shiny medal upon the winner of the race.
meanings.sent2: The king bestrowed titles upon his loyal subjects.
meanings.sent3: The fairy bestrowed magical powers upon the young hero.
meanings.sent4: The sun bestrows its warmth upon the earth each day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher bestrowed praise upon the hardworking student.

meanings.sent1: The wind bestrowed leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent2: The farmer bestrowed seeds in the freshly plowed field.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel bestrowed acorns all over the garden.
meanings.sent4: The artist bestrows colors across the canvas with skill.
meanings.sent5: The rain bestrows droplets on the window pane.

meanings.definition: To bestow a blessing or favor upon someone.
meanings.sent1: The priest bestrowed a blessing upon the newlyweds.
meanings.sent2: The grandmother bestrowed her wisdom upon her grandchildren.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm bestrowed good fortune upon its owner.
meanings.sent4: The kind gesture bestrows happiness in the recipient's heart.
meanings.sent5: The fairy godmother bestrows magic upon Cinderella.
